subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Olympic Games
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Sebastian Coe, the head of the London 2012 Organizing Committee and a former middle-distance running champion, has pushed the Olympic Games to restore the vigor to track events.
snippet: Sebastian Coe, the head of the London 2012 Organizing Committee and a former middle-distance running champion, has pushed the Olympic Games to restore the vigor to track events.
